reviewText: My mini pin is such a treat...smart, sly and very clever..I have tried many things to stop her from running out the door whenever the opportunity is worthy..she doesn't even have a name at that time..just another adventure.we are Workin it..!

This dvd was just slightly informative.  The whole production was done very cheaply and I do not recommend the dvd unless you want to waste your time and money.  You are much better off getting a good book on Min pins that has some quality to it.  The puppy training is just as worthless.  A dvd from the dog whisperer is much better time spent.

Peter
This book was very informative. These "little guys" think they are a lot bigger than they really are. If you have a Min-Pin you should think about getting this.
